name: Vkl-graph
body:
### Welcome to Vkl-Graph Pages.



This page is a presentation page where you can access to the showcase or you can check out the new branch:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git clone https://github.com/svandecappelle/vkl-graph.git
$ git pull https://github.com/svandecappelle/vkl-graph.git --to update the repository.
```
![Showcase](http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/20/screenshotfrom201301301.png)

# Introduction
## Requirements

   - A Google Web Toolkit project.

## Presentation
vklgraph is a GWT-based framework that integrate the JqPlot JavaScript Chart UI library.  
**Release Announcements**

* **Mar 15th 2013:** 1.2.1 Release upladed to Maven central repository & VklGraph switch to GitHub
* **Nov 30th 2012:** 1.2.0 New Stable release with simplified installation.
* **Nov 8th 2012:** Project has switched to Git environment. Showcase code has been opened
* **Sep 1st 2012:** 1.1.0 Some features added and refractoring on code.
* **Aug 16th 2012:** 1.0.0  First stable version of VklGraph on google code. New version of Showcase. See changeslogs.
* **Jul 26th 2012:** Adding refresh fonction. (With replot)
* **Jun 28th 2012:** First project initialisation.


## Installation details
See  [Wiki GettingStarted page](https://github.com/svandecappelle/vkl-graph/wiki/Getting-Started).

### Authors and Contributors
Developpers: @svandecappelle

Particular thank to Vekia's company for it's participation, on working out this project. [Vekia](http://vekia.org/index.php?lang=en)


### Support or Contact
Report an issue if any problems on using this library. I will check it regularly.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
